item.description:
Sunday's forecast is lookin' great with plenty of sunshine!

Let us know if you'd be up for it?

Average speed 10-15 mph. Riders should have a bike in good condition. Bring plenty of water and energy food. Helmets mandatory.

Missed you all last week on the Vineyard. I did 43 miles! It didn't rain!

Directions:

Start Broadmeadow Elementary School at 120 Broadmeadow Road, Needham, MA

Directions From Routes 128/95, take Exit 18, Great Plain Ave and head West towards Needham. At the first light, turn right onto Greendale Ave. Go up the hill 0.4 miles, just over the railroad bridge. The first left after the bridge is Grosvenor Road, turn and go .3 miles. Next right onto Broadmeadow Road for 0.1 miles and you are there

All the Best,

Rob Fox
Organizer
item.name: 30 Mile Needham/Dover Ride - Weather's lookin' good!!
